functions.name: alltrim
functions.description: Removes all leading and trailing spaces from a string.

functions.name: str
functions.description:
Converts the numeric expression to a string with `${2}` characters and `${3}` decimal places.
If `${3}` is not specified then `${1}` is treated as an integer

functions.name: type
functions.description:
Returns the data type of the expression `${1}`.
If the expression contains an error or a undefined variable, the function returns `U`.
Possible returns: N -> Number, C -> String/Character, L -> Boolean/Logic, A -> Array, U -> Undefined, P -> Procedure
